name: simple command to launch
description: simple application that can be launched within a container no environment variables are needed

environment-variables.name: WORKER_PROCESSES
environment-variables.description: number of Nginx worker processes. Should equal the number of CPUs made available to the Docker container

environment-variables.name: ERROR_LOG_LEVEL
environment-variables.description: reporting level for the error log. Defaults to warn.

environment-variables.name: PORTAL_VIRTUAL_HOST
environment-variables.description: virtual host for the portal application, for example PORTAL_VIRTUAL_HOST='mip.humanbrainproject.eu'. Defaults to 'frontend'

environment-variables.name: PORTAL_BACKEND_SERVER
environment-variables.description: address of the portal backend server, for example PORTAL_BACKEND_SERVER='backend:8080'

environment-variables.name: PORTAL_BACKEND_CONTEXT
environment-variables.description: context path for the portal backend server, defaults to 'services'.
